information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/joshuafontany/VSCode-TW5-Syntax/tree/main/syntaxes/tiddlywiki5.json
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
name: TiddlyWiki5

L:meta.variable.macro.body.tiddlywiki5,.comment: Text replacement in macro body (and other?) contexts.

R:text.html - (comment.block, text.html.comment: Uses R: to ensure this matches after any other injections.

patterns.comment: Yes this is a bit ridiculous, there are quite a lot of these
patterns.name: constant.character.entity.named.$2.html.tiddlywiki5

patterns.end:
(?ix:
(?=>
| type(?=[\s=])
(?!\s*=\s*
(
''
| ""
| ('|"|)
(
text/
(
javascript(1\.[0-5])?
| x-javascript
| jscript
| livescript
| (x-)?ecmascript
| babel

)
| application/
(
(x-)?javascript
| (x-)?ecmascript
)
| module
)
[\s"'>]
)
)
)
)
patterns.name: meta.tag.metadata.script.start.html.tiddlywiki5

patterns.comment: Treat nearest non-whitespace line as template tiddler title.
Treat nearest non-whitespace line as template tiddler title.

patterns.match:
(?x)
^
(?:
  (\^(?:[^^]|\^\^)) |  # Top alignment marker
  (\,(?:[^,]|\,\,))    # Bottom alignment marker
)?
([ \t]*)                 # Left alignment marker
(!)               # Heading cell marker
(.*?)                     # Cell contents
([ \t]*)                 # Right alignment marker
$
patterns.name: heading.th.meta.cell.tiddlywiki5

patterns.match:
(?x)
^
(?:
  (\^(?:[^^]|\^\^)) |  # Top alignment marker
  (\,(?:[^,]|\,\,))    # Bottom alignment marker
)?
([ \t]*)                 # Left alignment marker
()               # Heading cell marker
(.*?)                     # Cell contents
([ \t]*)                 # Right alignment marker
$
patterns.name: data.td.meta.cell.tiddlywiki5

patterns.comment: Treat nearest non-whitespace line as template tiddler title.
Treat nearest non-whitespace line as template tiddler title.
Handle image source or title and optional tooltip

patterns.name: constant.character.dash.ndash.tiddlywiki5
patterns.comment: Match an en-dash (--), ensuring it is not part of a decrement operator or arrow operator and not preceded by another dash (as in HTML comments).

patterns.name: constant.character.dash.mdash.tiddlywiki5
patterns.comment: Match an em-dash (---), ensuring it is not part of a longer dash sequence or within an HTML comment starter.
